title: Chad Johnson’s Resumé
text:
Accounting & Data Science

Chadjohnson319101@gmail.com | My LinkedIn Profile



I am an individual who pays great attention to detail and I am seeking an Accountant position within your organization to further my career. My collaborative approach, combined with my recent experience as a public accounting Audit and Assurance Intern, will be an asset to my future employment. I am excited about the opportunity to hear from you.




Proficient in a diverse array of tools and languages including: Tableau, MySQL, Python, R, QuickBooks, Practice CS, & VBA
Data visualization & manipulation
Audit & Assurance
Proficient in Excel and Word






Bachelor of Science in Accounting
Brigham Young University-Idaho



Minor in Data Science
Brigham Young University-Idaho






Cooper Norman Business Advisors & CPAs | 2024 Engaged in audits, reviews, and compilations of financial statements for various business entities. Enhanced my software capabilities using Practice CS Professional Suite Software, QuickBooks Online, and Excel daily. Developed audit analytical skills, applied GAAP & GAAS, and collaborated with team members & clients on larger projects.



Brigham Young University-Idaho Assisted in grading, teaching, and updating lesson plans for the professor…



Walmart | 2022-2023 I assisted with inventory checks and replenishment, ensuring products were always available. Additionally, I efficiently fulfilled online orders and played a key role in training new employees, contributing to the overall operational efficiency of the store.



Element Solar | 2021-2022 I proactively engaged in door-to-door sales of Solar Energy, stepping out of my comfort zone to secure appointments and facilitate the closing process for interested clients, showcasing a proactive and results-driven approach in sales.






The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints Extensive leadership experience in guiding and supporting others to achieve their goals, backed by unwavering dedication demonstrated through 16-hour workdays, 100 hours per week. Became Skilled in leading meetings, training others, and providing support to mission leadership, all driven by a strong service-oriented approach.
